home.hero_description: Taking into account both sides of the project, users and business to meet the needs of both, with analytical thinking, user research and surf the best methods resulting in functional UI and UX and 100% sure of its implementation, this thanks to the experience in development acquired in all these years.
home.ux_design_description: Together, we investigate, create, approach, test and innovate with great solutions.
home.data_description: Bring your data to a very friendly level so that anyone can understand in the best way and without bias.
home.front_dev_description: I can help you develop your digital product, thanks to the experience gained in HTML 5, VUE, JS, WordPress and more. I create and turn that idea into reality.
home.process_research_desc: We must test the precedents and get the largest amount of data about what we want to give solution
home.process_design_desc: It's time to play, to create, to immerse yourself in the theme and get the best strategy for your users
home.process_prototype_desc: But users has the last word, test design with them ensure that in the end you have the perfect product for your users
home.process_improve_desc: Take all the feedback from users and improve the design involves people in the process to get a better goal
home.process_deploy_desc: Once out of the design flow, we deploy the solution, thought and adjusted to the real needs of the users
home.process_support_desc: In the end, you will not be alone, any issue with the final product, we will look for you again the best solution together
home.contact_description:
Tell me about your needs and letâ€™s start working together on the best solution for users and business.

Iâ€™m not a freelancer, I will be part of your team.

about.title: Hi there! Iâ€™m a UX designer, developer and consultant working remotely from home.

bio.title: Bio
bio.content:
Creative, curious and analytical. High knowledge in development and web design, UX/UI for apps, user research and prototypes

I take into account both sides of the project, users and business to meet the needs of both. Applying analytical thinking, user research and evaluating the best methods and solutions, we get a real functional UX and UI designs 100% sure of its implementation, this thanks to the experience in development acquired in all these years.

1.title: UX Designer & developer
1.description: I have been design lover for a long time, but I have always been interested in functional design.  When I met the digital world and had a smart phone on my hands, I knew what I wanted to be the rest of my life, since then I have been studying the needs of people and companies, looking for a solution together and getting the best way to users, all designed for them, for people. Working with many agencies and clients, we achieve some digital products that really works!

2.title: Lead UX Designer
2.description: Working as design advisor, I transform complicated processes and concepts into simple, intuitive user flows and interfaces. I collaborate with stakeholders to ensure that final designs meet specifications, as well as the needs of end users. I work closely with engineering team to transform concept sketches to pixel-perfect prototypes. I provide final detailed design specifications and assets for front-end developers to implement. WeSendWallet Experience

3.title: UI/UX Designer
3.description: Create and design concepts for digital content has interactive info graphics and journalism investigations. Winner of an ABA price for Rio Cali special mini site. Also two times winning the Rodrigo Lloreda to best digital multimedia content. Nominated to best multimedia piece in the Simon Bolivar prices.

4.title: Creative direction
4.description: Oversee all creative development such as websites and graphic pieces.  Design of the interface for the company's flagship product, an E-Commerce, CRM and B2B system manager.

about.contact:
So, ready to disrupt?
Let's start a new project together!

brief.title: Brief & Estimation
brief.desc: Define and clarify the scope of project, what are the business needs and much time will take, we define the brief and conditions and terms.

kick_off.title: Kick Off & Discovery
kick_off.desc: We start the project firmly after having total knowledge of what the project will take in time and other conditions. Define the total features and know the brand to be implemented.

user_research.title: User research
user_research.desc: We focus on users, question are asked to know what they want and how they want to get helped by your product.

ia_wireframes.title: IA & Wireframes
ia_wireframes.desc: Review project information (users & business). This is mandatory o avoid possible and unnecessary changes in the deliverables. We create initial wireframes and mid-fidelity prototypes. Put prototypes to test and get feedback from users.

design.title: Hi-Fi Design
design.desc: The product gets is final face, here we apply the design system to that improved wireframe and gets the final design on the product. Creating Hi-fidelity prototype, testing, getting feedback and re design if needed.

delivery.title: Client deliverables
delivery.desc: Finally, after all the steps and loops ended, the design assets are being generated and validated. Itâ€™ll be delivered in the way that you or your development team need.

support.title: Dev. Support
support.desc: Iâ€™ll be supporting the development process to ensure that everything raised in the design stages is implemented. Also, at this moment some observation from the dev team will be valid, and a rethinking the things could be possible at this stage due to dev limitations.

portfolio.title: Latest Portfolio
